changelog: Added dynamic pack.mcmeta.j2 template supporting all Forge versions up to 1.21.10.
Integrated unified version mapping through versions.json for automatic Jinja2 rendering.
Expanded version metadata with fields like forge_gradle, java_version, eventBus7, reobf, and min/max_format for newer releases.
Enhanced create command compatibility with the new template system in evermod-cli.
Refined description handling in pack.mcmeta to match Minecraft JSON format evolution from 1.19.2 to 1.21.10.
Improved maintainability by consolidating all resource, data, and configuration templates into a single, version-aware structure.
Ensured full synchronization between evermod-cli and evermod-templates repositories for seamless mod creation.
notes: This release finalizes the transition to a fully dynamic, version-aware Jinja2 template system.
